text: The Prime Minister of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka ( ; ) is the most senior member of parliament in the cabinet of ministers in Sri Lanka. They are in charge for their policies and actions to parliament. The President is both head of state and head of government in Sri Lanka. Since 1978, most prime ministers have served as mere deputies to the executive presidency, while at times served as the de-facto head of government. ==List of prime ministers== ;Parties (7) (7) (1) (1) (1) No. Portrait Name Term of office Electoral mandates Time in office Other ministerial offices held while Prime Minister Political party of PM Government Refs 1 Senanayake දොන් ස්ටීවන් සේනානායක டான் ஸ்டீபன் சேனாநாயக்க 1947 1952† 1947 "Senanayake, Don Stephen (1884–1952)" . M. Jayaratne (2010–2015) on 18 November 2019, aged 88. ==References== *
title: Prime Minister of Sri Lanka
